original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields open steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 31.75/80 percent on Friday, steady from 31.70/80 percent on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 26.75/27.25 percent, steady from 27.00/27.40 percent.

State debt office said, 70,000 million Treasury Bonds under the series of 22.00 percent 2024’A’ and 110,000 million Treasury Bonds under the series of 18.00 percent 2027 ‘A’ are to be issued through an auction on March 13, 2023. (Colombo/Mar 10/2023)
